title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs with grated Parmesan cheese.
Mix everything together with pasta and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken in a creamy tomato sauce with Indian spices.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Simmer tomato puree and cream in a pan.
Add grilled chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
